name: NSFileProviderTestingOperationType
desc: The action that an operation performs.

items.name: case collisionResolution
items.desc: Resolves a collision by renaming the new item.

items.name: case creation
items.desc: Propagates the creation of a source item to the target location.

items.name: case deletion
items.desc: Propagates the deletion of the source item from the target location.

items.name: case ingestion
items.desc: Alerts the system to changes to either the local or remote storage.

items.name: case modification
items.desc: Propagates a change from the source item to the target location.
